CommandDefinition.Name: addinheritancerule
CommandDefinition.Description: Adds a parameter inheritance rule to an ordertype.

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: The ordertype that should use the inheritance rule.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application containing the ordertype

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: parameterType
Argument.Description: The type of the parameter. Valid types are: MonitoringLevel, SuspensionBackupMode

Argument.Name: childFilter
Argument.Description: The filter for the child ordertype hierarchy to which the inheritance rule will be applied. If not set the rule apply to the own ordertype.

Argument.Name: precedence
Argument.Description: The precedence of the inheritancerule. Default is 0
